title: Gears.of.War 4-CODEX +Fixed Crack RePack
description:
Title: Gears of War 4
Genre: Shooter
Developer: Microsoft Studios
Publisher: Microsoft Studios
Release Date: 11-10-2016

RePack Info:

Cut-scenes ripped, English only, Fixed crack included.
Strong compression using precomp, srep and arc.
Decompression should take ~20min on a decent machine.


Installation:

This game requires Windows 10 version 1607 or newer to play.
If the game doesn’t start try installing it to a non encrypted
Drive instead.

1. Mount the .ISO image using daemon tools or unpack it using winrar.
2. Install the game like every other.
3. Crack is already in place (the old one).
4. Disable your internet connection or block the game in your firewall.
5. Copy contents of "CODEX" directory to the game dir and replace files.
6. Run InstallApp.exe

You can now start the game from your Start menu
